content: the falling feathers toque when i wrote the falling feathers set i actually wrote this toque pattern first which is unusual since i often write the cowl and then draw my inspiration from there i just knew this stitch would make a wonderful hat and i was eager to try designing a messy bun pattern with covid this hair is getting quite long and unruly ***this pattern also contains a full picture tutorial on how to crochet the feather stitch *** ***i have also created a video tutorial for the feather stitch which you can view here *** https //youtu be/tgej-jhdbqs finished sizes instructions given to fit size small changes for medium & large are in s m l to fit head circumference 21 22 23 finished circumference 19 20 21 materials i used lion brand heartland which is 100% acrylic #4 worsted weight yarn any yarn of similar weight would work approximately 180 190 200 yds 5 5mm hook stitch markers yarn needle scissors measuring tape this pattern has been tested by a number of experienced crocheters and i have provided many pictures within the pattern to help you along the way if you run into trouble you are free to message me for help
